item.title: RT by @VexSlain: We talk a lot about how this decision will kill people, and it will. But the ones who don't die, who are forced to carry to term and give birth, deserve to be mourned equally. Being pregnant when you don't want to be is horrific, dangerous, and intensely traumatic.
item.dc:creator: @queenozymandias
item.description: We talk a lot about how this decision will kill people, and it will. But the ones who don't die, who are forced to carry to term and give birth, deserve to be mourned equally. Being pregnant when you don't want to be is horrific, dangerous, and intensely traumatic.
